c3d.camera.name: c3d.camera

c3d.camera.set_position.summary: Changes the position of the current camera

c3d.camera.set_rotation.summary: Changes the rotation of the current camera

c3d.event.wait.summary: returns event from the queue, if there isnt one it waits for one

c3d.sys.get_bus.summary: returns the internal data sharing BUS

c3d.textinput.summary: A really simple callback function for when characters are pressed.

c3d.thread.name: c3d.thread
c3d.thread.summary: the thread module is used for multitasking and sharing data across "channels" IMPORTANT: you can use the threaderror cal...

c3d.thread.channel.clear.name: c3d.thread.channel.clear()
c3d.thread.channel.clear.summary: completely clears the data queue of the channel

c3d.thread.channel.demand.name: c3d.thread.channel.demand(timeout)
c3d.thread.channel.demand.summary: returns a value from the queue.

c3d.thread.channel.get_count.name: c3d.thread.channel.get_count()
c3d.thread.channel.get_count.summary: returns the amount of things stored in the queue

c3d.thread.channel.has_read.name: c3d.thread.channel.has_read(ID)
c3d.thread.channel.has_read.summary: checks if a specific value in the queue has been read already

c3d.thread.channel.peek.name: c3d.thread.channel.peek()
c3d.thread.channel.peek.summary: reads a value from the queue without removing it

c3d.thread.channel.pop.name: c3d.thread.channel.pop()
c3d.thread.channel.pop.summary: removes a value from the queue and returns it

c3d.thread.channel.push.name: c3d.thread.channel.push(value)
c3d.thread.channel.push.summary: adds a value to the queue of the channel

c3d.thread.channel.supply.name: c3d.thread.channel.supply(value, timeout)
c3d.thread.channel.supply.summary: adds a value to the queue of the channel and waits for that value to be read (pop'ed) or for the timeout to go off

c3d.thread.get_channel.name: c3d.thread.get_channel(name)
c3d.thread.get_channel.summary: returns a channel object for a given name.

c3d.thread.new_channel.name: c3d.thread.new_channel()
c3d.thread.new_channel.summary: creates a new channel object without a set name

c3d.thread.thread.get_error.name: c3d.thread.thread.get_error()
c3d.thread.thread.get_error.summary: if the thread happened to error this returns the error message

c3d.thread.thread.is_running.name: c3d.thread.thread.is_running()
c3d.thread.thread.is_running.summary: checks if the thread is currently running

c3d.thread.thread.start.name: c3d.thread.thread.start()
c3d.thread.thread.start.summary: starts the execution of this thread

c3d.thread.thread.wait.name: c3d.thread.thread.wait()
c3d.thread.thread.wait.summary: waits until the thread finishes execution

c3d.threaderror.name: c3d.threaderror
c3d.threaderror.summary: This callback is called when a thread object from the thread module thread object has an exception happen.

palette.apply_palette.summary: applies the saved palette to the current screen and returns the texture object it originates from

scene_object.name: scene_object
scene_object.summary: The scene object is used to interact with the 3D models in the scene.

scene_object.clone.summary: creates an instantiated copy of this object and returns it

scene_object.fields.effects.name: scene_object.fields.effects

scene_object.fields.properties.name: scene_object.fields.properties

scene_object.remove.summary: removes the geometry from the scene

scene_object.reposition.name: scene_object.reposition(x, y, z)

scene_object.set_geometry_shader.name: scene_object.set_geometry_shader(shader)

scene_object.set_position.name: scene_object.set_position(x, y, z)
scene_object.set_position.summary: Changes the position of the object

scene_object.set_rotation.name: scene_object.set_rotation(...)

scene_object.set_size.name: scene_object.set_size(scale_x, scale_y, scale_z)
scene_object.set_size.summary: Resizes the object by modifying its scaling matrix

scene_object.set_vertex_shader.name: scene_object.set_vertex_shader(shader)
scene_object.set_vertex_shader.summary: sets the vertex shader for this geometry
